title: Restyle Whisper Profile page to grounded civic look (visual-only)

requirements.summary: Restyle Profile page to a grounded civic aesthetic using the specified palette, elevation, borders, and subtle glassmorphism while preserving structure and functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile page layout/sections remain in the same order and presence: header/back+menu (via PageLayout), profile card, WSP token balance, contribution points, staking section, governance section.
No changes to React state variables, hooks used, data fetching, mutations, or conditional rendering logic in ProfilePage.
Base/background appearance reads as deep navy/slate with soft white/gray typography; no pastel/fruity gradient look.
Cards use stronger elevation (shadow-md/shadow-lg/2xl acceptable), subtle dark borders (gray-700-ish), and optional backdrop blur with dark translucent backgrounds to create depth.

file_operations.description: Update Tailwind className styling only to achieve deep navy/slate base with teal/cyan + warm gold accents, stronger elevation/shadows, subtle dark borders, and restrained dark glassmorphism; keep the section order/structure intact. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button/Input/Label components for visual wrappers and hierarchy (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Visually emphasize the WSP Token Balance section with larger/bolder gradient typography and a purely visual flourish when balance > 0, without changing loading/zero behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: When balance is loading, the loading UI remains functionally identical (spinner + “Loading balance...” text).
When balance is 0, “Start earning today!” remains visible and styled to feel motivational/wholesome, using gold accent.
When balance is > 0, an additional accent element (Sparkles and/or a decorative ring) appears and is purely visual (no new state/hooks).
The balance typography is noticeably more prominent than surrounding text and CTAs.

file_operations.description: Enhance the WSP Token Balance Card visuals: make the numeric line more prominent (size/weight), apply teal→cyan gradient text with subtle glow/elevation using existing Tailwind utilities, and add a conditional visual-only flourish when wspBalance > 0 (e.g., Lucide Sparkles icon and/or a decorative ring element) while keeping existing loading and zero-balance subtext behavior unchanged. Continue using lucide-react icons (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Restyle Contribution Points section with distinct per-category accents, improved hierarchy, motivational subtext, and a subtle zero-value hint per category without changing data logic.
acceptanceCriteria: The points grid still renders the same four categories and uses the same data sources.
Each category card has a clear, distinct accent color (blue, purple, gold, green as requested) that is visible at a glance.
If a category’s displayed value is '0', a subtle extra visual cue appears within that card (e.g., small Sparkles + 'Earn more' text).
Motivational subtext appears under the Contribution Points heading/description and is readable on dark background.

file_operations.description: Update Contribution Points Card styling: add motivational subtext below the section header area; refine category label vs value hierarchy; apply distinct accent treatments per category via border/left-accent/icon color; and for any category where the displayed value is '0', render a small extra visual hint (e.g., Lucide Sparkles and a non-navigating 'Earn more' link-styled text) without introducing new hooks/state or altering data usage. Use lucide-react icons for accents (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Restyle Staking and Governance sections to match the civic palette and make CTAs more prominent with specified gradients, hover scale, and accent Lucide icons—without changing behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Stake/Unstake inputs, validation messages, pending states, and toast messages behave exactly as before.
Governance proposal list behavior, empty/loading/error states, and dialogs behave exactly as before.
Stake Tokens CTA is visually dominant and uses teal→cyan gradient styling with noticeable hover/active/focus states.
Create Proposal CTA is visually dominant and uses purple→pink gradient styling with noticeable hover/active/focus states.
All section cards match the darker, more grounded card styling (borders, elevation, backdrop blur) and avoid pastel/fruity gradients.

file_operations.description: Update Tailwind className styling only to align the staking section card with grounded dark civic styling (border/elevation/backdrop blur) and increase CTA prominence: larger button sizing/weight, min height for touch, teal→cyan gradient for primary staking CTA, hover scale transitions (leveraging existing Tailwind utilities / tailwindcss-animate if present), and Lucide icon accent coloring. Keep all validation, pending states, and toast behavior unchanged. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button/Input/Label components (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Update Tailwind className styling only to align the governance section card with grounded dark civic styling (border/elevation/backdrop blur) and increase CTA prominence: larger 'Create Proposal' button with purple→pink gradient, hover scale transitions (leveraging existing Tailwind utilities / tailwindcss-animate if present), and Lucide icon accent coloring. Preserve proposal list rendering, empty/loading/error states, and dialog behavior. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button/Badge components (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Apply mobile-first spacing, typography, touch-target sizing, and accessible focus rings across Profile page and sections using Tailwind classes.
acceptanceCriteria: On small screens, all sections stack cleanly with consistent spacing and no cramped tap targets.
Buttons meet touch-friendly sizing (e.g., min-h-12) without breaking layouts.
Headings/labels are consistently bolder than body text and establish clear hierarchy.
Focus rings are visible on interactive elements and use accent colors (teal/cyan/purple) while maintaining dark background contrast.

file_operations.description: Adjust Profile page typography and spacing using Tailwind className updates only: ensure mobile-first vertical stacking with consistent gaps, add generous padding (e.g., p-6 on major cards/sections where appropriate), standardize heading sizes/weights (text-xl/text-2xl font-bold) and body readability (text-base font-medium), enforce touch-friendly buttons (min-h-12), and ensure focus-visible rings on interactive elements use accent colors with sufficient contrast. Use existing shadcn-ui components for consistent styling (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Apply mobile-first spacing and touch target improvements within staking controls via Tailwind classes only: increase padding, ensure inputs/buttons have comfortable vertical spacing, and add/align focus-visible rings with teal/cyan accents without altering logic. Use existing shadcn-ui Input/Button (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

Apply mobile-first spacing and touch target improvements within governance section via Tailwind classes only: ensure header layout wraps cleanly on small screens, proposal rows remain readable, and interactive elements have visible focus rings and comfortable padding. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/Badge (verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
